knimeNode.name: Mz Binner
knimeNode.shortDescription: Bins m/z-intensity data points of mass spectrometry data scans in the m/z domain.

fullDescription.intro: Bins m/z-intensity data points of mass spectrometry data scans in the m/z domain using equidistant binning. Binned data points result from either the average, maximum, minimum, or sum of the data points that fall into a bin.
fullDescription.option: The width of the individual m/z bins in amu.
The method to calculate the binned value. Max: maximum value; Min: minimum value; Sum: Sum total of all values in bin; Avg: Average of bin values.

ports.inPort: Table containing mass spec data (MS Data).
ports.outPort: Table containing binned mass spec data (MS Data).
